title: Rmarkdown HTML Document based on Primer CSS â€” html_document_primer
text: auto_theme Indicates whether theme changed based user's system preferences light_theme light theme, e.g., "light" dark_theme dark theme, e.g., "dark", "dark_dimmed", "dark_high_contrast" list_style Indicates whether list elements use bullets enable_checkboxes Indicates whether check boxes can modified css CSS /Sass files include. Files extension .sass .scss compiled CSS via sass::sass(). Also, theme bslib::bs_theme() object, Sass code may reference relevant Bootstrap Sass variables, functions, mixins, etc. toc TRUE include table contents output toc_depth Depth headers include table contents header Indicates whether title included header output document mathjax Include mathjax. "default" option uses https URL MathJax CDN. "local" option uses local version MathJax (copied output directory). can pass alternate URL pass NULL exclude MathJax entirely. fig_width Default width (inches) figures fig_height Default height (inches) figures fig_retina Scaling perform retina displays (defaults 2, currently works widely used retina displays). Set NULL prevent retina scaling. Note always NULL keep_md specified (fig_retina relies outputting HTML directly markdown document). footer Indicates whether footer shown keep_md Keep markdown file generated knitting. dev Graphics device use figure output (defaults png) highlight Indicates whether code highlighted pandoc_args Additional command line options pass pandoc extra_dependencies, ... Additional function arguments pass base R Markdown HTML output formatter html_document_base md_extensions Markdown extensions added removed default definition R Markdown. See rmarkdown_format additional details. self_contained Produce standalone HTML file external dependencies, using data: URIs incorporate contents linked scripts, stylesheets, images, videos. Note even self contained documents MathJax still loaded externally (necessary size).
